heading: ABOUT THE CONFERENCE
description: Department of Information Technology, Atal Bihari Vajpayee Indian Institute of Information Technology and Management (ABV-IIITM), Gwalior, India is organizing 5th International Conference on Advanced Network Technologies and Intelligent Computing (ANTIC-2025) in hybrid mode...

where.title: WHERE
where.text:
The Conference will be hosted in Hybrid Mode
(Online as well as On-Site).
Department of Information Technology, ABV-IIITM, Gwalior, India
